<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Infiltrator's Accessory](/Equipment.aspx?ID=736)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 261 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 150 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Sword Cane](/Weapons.aspx?ID=127)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This elegant _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [sword cane](/Weapons.aspx?ID=127)_ serves equally well as a fashionable accessory and hidden weapon suitable for high-society events where weapons aren't typically permitted.

<document level="2" id="action-582" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Infiltrator's Accessory
